verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֥א <WH4853> The burden דְבַר־ <WH1697> of the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> concerning יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> for Israel נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD נֹטֶ֤ה <WH5186> which stretcheth שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> forth the heavens וְיֹסֵ֣ד <WH3245> and layeth the foundation אָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְיֹצֵ֥ר <WH3335> and formeth רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> the spirit אָדָ֖ם <WH120> of man בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7130> within פ

הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold אָ֠נֹכִי <WH595> I שָׂ֣ם <WH7760> Behold I will make אֶת־ <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֧ם <WH3389> Jerusalem סַף־ <WH5592> a cup רַ֛עַל <WH7478> of trembling לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הָעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> unto all the people סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about וְגַ֧ם <WH1571> will also עַל־ <WH5921> is against יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> both against Judah יִֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become בַמָּצ֖וֹר <WH4692> when they shall be in the siege עַל־ <WH5921> be against יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> [and] against Jerusalem

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> will come בַיּוֹם־ <WH3117> And in that day הַ֠הוּא <WH1931> I אָשִׂ֨ים <WH7760> will I make אֶת־ <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> Jerusalem אֶ֤בֶן <WH68> stone מַֽעֲמָסָה֙ <WH4614> a burdensome לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> for all people כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֹמְסֶ֖יהָ <WH6006> all that burden שָׂר֣וֹט <WH8295> will be severely יִשָּׂרֵ֑טוּ <WH8295> injured וְנֶאֶסְפ֣וּ <WH622> be gathered together עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> against כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> and all גּוֹיֵ֥י <WH1471> though all the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

בַּיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֜וּא <WH1931> he נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אַכֶּ֤ה <WH5221> I will smite כָל־ <WH3605> every סוּס֙ <WH5483> every horse בַּתִּמָּה֔וֹן <WH8541> with astonishment וְרֹכְב֖וֹ <WH7392> and his rider בַּשִּׁגָּע֑וֹן <WH7697> with madness וְעַל־ <WH5921> over בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> upon the house יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah אֶפְקַ֣ח <WH6491> and I will open אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינַ֔י <WH5869> mine eyes וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> every ס֣וּס <WH5483> every horse הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> of the people אַכֶּ֖ה <WH5221> and will smite בַּֽעִוָּרֽוֹן׃ <WH5788> with blindness

וְאָֽמְר֛וּ <WH559> shall say אַלֻּפֵ֥י <WH441> And the governors יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah בְּלִבָּ֑ם <WH3820> in their heart אַמְצָ֥ה <WH556> [shall be] my strength לִי֙ יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> The inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem בַּיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> in the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> their God

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֡וּא <WH1931> I אָשִׂים֩ <WH7760> will I make אֶת־ <WH853> אַלֻּפֵ֨י <WH441> the governors יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> of Judah כְּֽכִיּ֧וֹר <WH3595> like an hearth אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> of fire בְּעֵצִ֗ים <WH6086> among the wood וּכְלַפִּ֥יד <WH3940> and like a torch אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> of fire בְּעָמִ֔יר <WH5995> in a sheaf וְאָ֨כְל֜וּ <WH398> and they shall devour עַל־ <WH5921> on יָמִ֧ין <WH3225> on the right hand וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on שְׂמֹ֛אול <WH8040> and on the left אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> all the people סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about וְיָשְׁבָ֨ה <WH3427> shall be inhabited יְרוּשָׁלִַ֥ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem ע֛וֹד <WH5750> again תַּחְתֶּ֖יהָ <WH8478> sites בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> again in her own place [even] in Jerusalem פ

וְהוֹשִׁ֧יעַ <WH3467> also shall save יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> The LORD אֶת־ <WH853> אָהֳלֵ֥י <WH168> the tents יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah בָּרִֽאשֹׁנָ֑ה <WH7223> first לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> so לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תִגְדַּ֜ל <WH1431> do not magnify תִּפְאֶ֣רֶת <WH8597> that the glory בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house דָּוִ֗יד <WH1732> of David וְתִפְאֶ֛רֶת <WH8597> and the glory יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> of the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem עַל־ <WH5921> above יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> [themselves] against Judah

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יָגֵ֤ן <WH1598> defend יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> shall the LORD בְּעַד֙ <WH1157> about יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> become הַנִּכְשָׁ֥ל <WH3782> and he that is feeble בָּהֶ֛ם בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> among them at that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he כְּדָוִ֑יד <WH1732> shall be as David וּבֵ֤ית <WH1004> and the house דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> of David כֵּֽאלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> [shall be] as God כְּמַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> as the angel יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> before

וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> I אֲבַקֵּ֗שׁ <WH1245> [that] I will seek לְהַשְׁמִיד֙ <WH8045> to destroy אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> all the nations הַבָּאִ֖ים <WH935> that come עַל־ <WH5921> against יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> against Jerusalem

וְשָׁפַכְתִּי֩ <WH8210> And I will pour עַל־ <WH5921> over בֵּ֨ית <WH1004> upon the house דָּוִ֜יד <WH1732> of David וְעַ֣ל ׀ <WH5921> over יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> and upon the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem ר֤וּחַ <WH7307> the spirit חֵן֙ <WH2580> of grace וְתַ֣חֲנוּנִ֔ים <WH8469> and of supplications וְהִבִּ֥יטוּ <WH5027> and they shall look אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom דָּקָ֑רוּ <WH1856> upon me whom they have pierced וְסָפְד֣וּ <WH5594> for him as one mourneth עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> over כְּמִסְפֵּד֙ <WH5594> mourns עַל־ <WH5921> over הַיָּחִ֔יד <WH3173> for [his] only וְהָמֵ֥ר <WH4843> [son] and shall be in bitterness עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> over כְּהָמֵ֥ר <WH4843> for him as one that is in bitterness עַֽל־ <WH5921> over הַבְּכֽוֹר׃ <WH1060> for [his] firstborn

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יִגְדַּ֤ל <WH1431> shall there be a great הַמִּסְפֵּד֙ <WH4553> mourning בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem כְּמִסְפַּ֥ד <WH4553> as the mourning הֲדַדְ־ רִמּ֖וֹן <WH1910> of Hadadrimmon בְּבִקְעַ֥ת <WH1237> in the valley מְגִדּֽוֹן׃ <WH4023> of Megiddon

וְסָפְדָ֣ה <WH5594> shall mourn הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> And the land מִשְׁפָּח֥וֹת <WH4940> every מִשְׁפָּח֖וֹת <WH4940> family לְבָ֑ד <WH905> apart מִשְׁפַּ֨חַת <WH4940> the family בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house דָּוִ֤יד <WH1732> of David לְבָד֙ <WH905> itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֣ם <WH802> apart and their wives לְבָ֔ד <WH905> themselves מִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <WH4940> apart the family בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house נָתָן֙ <WH5416> of Nathan לְבָ֔ד <WH905> itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH802> apart and their wives לְבָֽד׃ <WH905> themselves

מִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <WH4940> The family בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house לֵוִי֙ <WH3878> of Levi לְבָ֔ד <WH905> itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH802> apart and their wives לְבָ֑ד <WH905> themselves מִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <WH4940> apart the family הַשִּׁמְעִי֙ <WH8097> of Shimei לְבָ֔ד <WH905> itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH802> apart and their wives לְבָֽד׃ <WH905> themselves

כֹּ֗ל <WH3605> all הַמִּשְׁפָּחוֹת֙ <WH4940> All the families הַנִּשְׁאָר֔וֹת <WH7604> that remain מִשְׁפָּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> every family מִשְׁפָּחֹ֖ת <WH4940> family לְבָ֑ד <WH905> itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH802> apart and their wives לְבָֽד׃ <WH905> themselves ס
